      • viewArtworkPage

        @GetMapping("DigitalLibrary/Artwork")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView viewArtworkPage​(@RequestParam
                                                                    int artId,
                                                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Parameters:
        artId - The id of the Artwork to be shown.
        request - HttpServletRequest.
        Returns:
        If logged, the ModelAndView containing all the Artwork data and the template page to be rendered; if not logged, a redirect to the Login Page.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown if data manipulation error arises.

      • insertNewArtwork

        @RequestMapping(value="/DigitalLibrary/AddArtwork",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView insertNewArtwork​(@RequestParam("inputTitle")
                                                                     java.lang.String title,
                                                                     @RequestParam("inputDescription")
                                                                     java.lang.String description,
                                                                     @RequestParam("inputIsbn")
                                                                     java.lang.String isbn,
                                                                     @RequestParam("inputYear")
                                                                     int year,
                                                                     @RequestParam("inputLanguage")
                                                                     java.lang.String language,
                                                                     @RequestParam("inputCategory")
                                                                     int category,
                                                                     @RequestParam("inputAuthors")
                                                                     java.lang.String[] author,
                                                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the Artwork to be added.
        description - The description of the Artwork to be added.
        isbn - The title of the Artwork to be added.
        year - The title of the Artwork to be added.
        language - The title of the Artwork to be added.
        category - The title of the Artwork to be added.
        author - The title of the Artwork to be added.
        request - HttpServletRequest.
        Returns:
        If logged and if the insertion is successful, a redirect to a success page, if the insertion is not successful a redirect to an error page; if not logged, a redirect to the Login Page.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown if data manipulation error arises.

        Returns:

                                                               throws java.sql.SQLException

        request - HttpServletRequest.
        Returns:
        If logged, the ModelAndView containing all the Images of a specific Artwork, a list of all the transcribers and the template page to be rendered; if not logged, a redirect to the Login Page.

        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown if data manipulation error arises.

        request - HttpServletRequest.
        Returns:

        request - HttpServletRequest.

      • getImagesToBeValidated

        @GetMapping("/DigitalLibrary/Artwork/ValidateImage/Validate")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getImagesToBeValidated​(@RequestParam("imgId")
                                                                           int imgId,
                                                                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                                    throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                                                           java.io.IOException,
                                                                           java.text.ParseException
        Parameters:
        imgId - The id of the Image to be validated.
        request - HttpServletRequest.
        Returns:
        If logged, the ModelAndView containing the image to be validated and all its attributes and the template page to be rendered; if not logged, a redirect to the Login Page.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown if data manipulation error arises.
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if IO error arises.
        java.text.ParseException - Thrown if parsing error arises.
